summary: The module provides an end‑to‑end example for training textual inversion embeddings with the Flax (JAX) backend of the Diffusers library. It loads a Stable Diffusion pipeline, prepares a dataset of prompts and token embeddings, defines loss computation, optimizer updates, and a training loop, and finally saves the learned token parameters.
business_intent: Enable users to create custom textual tokens that capture new visual concepts, allowing personalized text‑to‑image generation with Stable Diffusion models.
